name: cyberduck/mail
description: Allow Laravel to use a secondary mail package.

suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SES mail driver (~3.0).
suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Required to use the Mailgun and Mandrill mail drivers (~5.3|~6.0).
suggest.jeremeamia/superclosure: Required to be able to serialize closures (~2.0).
